urls.title: A Member of Twitter’s Trust and Safety Council Explains Why She Got Fed Up and Quit
urls.description: Eirliani Abdul Rahman helped the platform stop youth sexual exploitation. The new boss wasn’t listening.

tweets.text:
Courageous @eirliani @podesta_lesley +@annecollier resigned in protest from Twitter trust&safety council, which has been ignored by @elonmusk even as hate speech on platform has doubled under his ownership 

https://t.co/Qk6TKe3ots https://t.co/JVm4Eantxp
@eirliani @Twitter I have so much respect for your decision, my dear friend. 👍

@podesta_lesley @karahinesley @karaswisher @profgalloway That is so 😔Lesley, Eirliani & Anne! You were chosen back in 2016 because those of us at Twitter at the time knew you would help the company do better on safety issues. There are still great people there fighting the good (safety) fight & they will be poorer w/out your support!
@podesta_lesley @karahinesley @karaswisher @profgalloway +@eirliani & @annecollier!

Three of us resigned today. There was a sense that it’s just becoming empty words now, so depressing watching the breakdown of a culture that worked hard to get policies on safety & moderation right @karahinesley @karaswisher @tweetinjules @profgalloway https://t.co/XgHHtu7Zp5

urls.title: Members of Twitter’s Trust & Safety Council Resign in Protest Against Elon Musk's 'Safety' Messages to Date - NetFamilyNews.org
urls.description: We are announcing our resignation from Twitter’s Trust and Safety Council because it is clear from research evidence that, contrary to claims by Elon Musk, the safety and wellbeing of Twitter’s users are on the decline. The question has been on our minds: Should Musk be allowed to define digital safety as he has freedom […]

tweets.text: Three of us resigned from Twitter’s Trust & Safety Council today: @eirliani @podesta_lesley and me. Here’s why https://t.co/h05TblfGIO https://t.co/iqcHvhbgms

urls.title: World in brief: Biden seeks to win over African leaders
urls.description: At the US-Africa Leaders Summit, Washington will need to go beyond strategic geopolitical interest to compete with China’s offer, says James Orr.

tweets.text:
Fifty African leaders head to DC this month for a major summit with Biden as the US seeks to reengage with the continent. Latest for @TheWorldToday @ChathamHouse. With thanks to Gilbert Kaplan/@KahWalla. 
https://t.co/PH1YZzFiOY

urls.title: Advisory Council » Global Diplomacy Lab
urls.description: Together with the Leading Partners, the Dean and the Secretariat, the Advisory Council has the task to conceptualize the labs and to shape the future of the platform. The Advisory Council is composed by one representative of each partner institution, the Dean, the Secretariat and four elected members. Ruprecht Polenz was a member of the German Parliament from 1994 to 2013 as representant of the City of Muenster. He was the Chairman of the German Bundestag’s Committee on Foreign Affairs from 2005 to 2013.

urls.description: China verletzt massiv Menschenrechte und gewinnt zugleich weltweit an Einfluss. Was kann Deutschland tun? Dem SPIEGEL liegt dazu der erste Entwurf des Auswärtigen Amts vor.

tweets.text:
Confidential @AuswaertigesAmt draft of 🇩🇪China strategy that was sent to chancellory & other ministries for review and comments was leaked to @derspiegel that runs an article on it with select quotes. 
https://t.co/UQeFio6Ise

urls.title: (S+) China: Das steht im vertraulichen Strategiepapier der Bundesregierung
urls.description: China verletzt massiv Menschenrechte und gewinnt zugleich weltweit an Einfluss. Was kann Deutschland tun? Dem SPIEGEL liegt dazu der erste Entwurf des Auswärtigen Amts vor.

tweets.text: The only surprise in the @DerSpiegel story on Berlin’s draft China strategy is @GermanyDiplo’s support for the scoping of a bilateral investment agreement with Taiwan. urls.title: Fighting While Female
urls.description: Gender dynamics are shaping the war in Ukraine.

tweets.text:
“If there is a feminist way of war, Kyiv wants everyone to know that this is how it is fighting its conflict with Moscow.” Read @OlyaOliker on how gender has loomed large in the war in Ukraine—and how Kyiv can build a truly equitable army. 
https://t.co/MMtYMBGJTD

👏Congrats @alice_ekman on your new book! 

In "dernier vol pour Pékin" Alice analyses how #China is closing off  & the emergence of a world split into 2 poles that no longer understand each other. https://t.co/FRwPQFlRsB

Zeitenwende has morphed into a catch-all term and shorthand jargon for analysts inside and outside Germany to describe whatever policy change they want to see from Berlin. This goes beyond Berlin’s response to Russia to now include a more assertive German China policy. (8/9)

On China policy, Washington could offer a regular, structured dialogue on China to the German chancellery (where key decisions on China are taken) to discuss the different threat perceptions and priorities in the United States and Berlin. @thorstenbenner @noahbarkin (7/9)

The intra-European distrust should worry policymakers in Washington as it makes a stronger European role in Ukraine and on China less likely. Washington should encourage Germany more resolutely than so far to assume a leadership role in Ukraine and recalibrate China policy (3/9)

urls.title: Don't Let Zeitenwende Get Derailed - War on the Rocks
urls.description: Days after the invasion of Ukraine, recently elected Chancellor Olaf Scholz announced major changes in German defense and energy policy, signaling a

urls.title: Feminist foreign policy needs an upgrade
urls.description: ‘FFP2.0’ would have a less gendered focus, broader fairness and better alignment with domestic policy, say Eirliani Abdul Rahman and Jesse Bump.

tweets.text:
Is a feminist foreign policy fit for purpose? @eirliani and @JesseBump say feminism and the military are not mutually exclusive - a fair foreign policy permits self-defence and directly addresses gender-based violence in war.

Find out more⬇️  

https://t.co/yuFwe179Fe

urls.title: Postcard from Istanbul: Why I had to flee Afghanistan
urls.description: Somaia Valizadeh, an Afghan journalist, describes building her new life in Turkey since escaping the Taliban.

urls.title: Mexico aims to lead the way
urls.description: Daniela Philipson García on a unique opportunity for regional leadership on gender

tweets.text:
10 women are killed daily in Mexico. Many of these killings are considered femicides or hate-crimes. 

Mexico has introduced a feminist foreign policy, but must go much further in tackling deeply entrenched attitudes to women, argues @daniphilipson 

https://t.co/5GZlWHiE5s

urls.description: Vi sualised above is the mapping of incidents of sexual violence submitted by thousands of people from around the world. Tomorrow is the start of #16DaysOfActivism to eliminate violence against women & girls. If you are shocked/ appalled about the recent news (& not so recent news) & want to take action, you can 
a) Attend one of @TheSafecityApp events
b) Report violence on https://t.co/05eZXTsx5b

When amazing @eirliani read an excerpt from her book, & talked abt the sleepless nights,the nightmares,I broke down sobbing. 1 of my abusers wld hang me upside down by my ankles,frm the 3rd story bedroom window,when I ws 5yrs old & I myself ws unable 2 sleep alone till my mid 40s
As you said, this is just the beginning. Love you loads! https://t.co/JFq4lYqLrV

Our #heroes, so much strength, and power in sharing stories. Thank you for sharing yours @eirliani @NJLahori 

🧵, please read. https://t.co/zSUupQsx0G
@eirliani @Nov18worldday Was talking to Sara and Nina today. We all sat in the chapel w Ruba, Jennifer joined us. And we talked. You were so there w us.

An imp point @eirliani made was about Global Survivor Councils w Survivor leadership. She made it clear we are “Not about victim hood. We have power we have agency” 
About November 18th @Nov18worldday Eirliani said, “Today we make history 2day is but a step.
Our work begins now” https://t.co/j7xkIGusot

"Not about victim hood, we have power, we have agency"

Such a powerful, thought provoking address @eirliani 💙 #Nov18WorldDay #Heroes #CSA https://t.co/4Ch8QsQRN7

then that 10 yr old in me,will become,more & more,a firm part of my past,rather than my present.” 
Eirliani A Rahman @eirliani 
Brave & beautiful words 4 @Nov18worldday 
A day 2 work 2wards ending #childsexualabuse,the healing of #csa survivors & protection of childrens dignity💙

“But even if our wounds take a long time 2 heal.Even if the pain feels somehow,infinite. If I can,through my own experience,communicate the imp of prevention 2 parents & educators & tell them that abuse DOES happen,in our homes & schools,& in so doing,help a child b4 its 2 late,

Fascinating bits and pieces from the prep for Merkel’s first encounter with Trump in @peterbakernyt and @sbg1 great book. @MSCheusgen quite optimistic on China in conversation with Steve Bannon: “Maybe in thirty years” time to care about China, now Russia the immediate threat. https://t.co/OMNozpQzzy

My beautiful sister Ruba Nawaz. My friend who introduced me to @Nov18worldday @DrJWortham … the journey comes to an end today. Till next year. But the work continues to end #childsexualabuse. To find healing for survivors and to be a voice to protect children still being abused! https://t.co/PnnpQv5kA5

tweets.text:
Our Heroes Gala. A landmark event held in honor of the first @UN #Nov18WorldDay to recognize the outstanding work of those who have dedicated their lives to protecting 
children from violence, and supporting survivors on their healing journey.

Join us🕯 https://t.co/Ihrb2EpzMi https://t.co/QUzm5bsXuo
With us on this mission to end child sexual abuse, and supporting victims and survivors of childhood trauma in their healing 🙏 #Nov18WorldDay https://t.co/EH4mzNopFK

Working towards the establishment of the @UN #Nov18WorldDay has been a very personal journey for me. One that started four years ago, when I first asked @Pontifex if we could have a World Day to protect children and help survivors in their healing.
To be here now 🙏 https://t.co/rCUkMwnLWv

Off 2 the Vatican, 2 meet His Excellency The Pope  himself. A beautiful crisp morning in Rome. Alhamdolillah blessed 2 be w this beautiful band of warriors/survivors. I have made such amazing new friends w @Nov18worldday #childsexualabuse We are truly thriving together,Praise God https://t.co/okMmVsSPvx https://t.co/xdTxovJy7p

Appreciate my friend @eirliani and her colleague's thoughts here. How ideas and policies are presented is important. https://t.co/vzmS845uKg

📢Promoting our advocacy with Brave Movement for 18th November - End Child Sexual Abuse Day!
 
Let’s join forces around the 2nd Annual World Day for Prevention, Healing and Justice to End Childhood Sexual Violence!
 
#PreventionHealingJustice
 
#Safecity #RedDotFoundation https://t.co/MzhbwCzWCp

urls.title: Time for a Fair Foreign Policy
urls.description: The concept of feminist foreign policy is flawed and needs to be broadened. Fair foreign policy is an alternative approach that could be less polarizing and achieve better outcomes.

tweets.text: .@JesseBump and @eirliani argue that the concept of a feminist foreign policy needs to be broadened into a "fair foreign policy" https://t.co/qdgLdp5byM #ffp

#GDL2022 taking over @Lavacatuitera in #BuenosAires today, a feminist newsroom & community space fighting for social change in #Argentina 

#globaldiplomacy #GDL #memoryinpresence #globaldiplomacylab https://t.co/GMq1uuNsZJ

GDL Members discussing the #challenges and #solutions to get diplomats involved in #memory activities + future methods to engage #diplomats in such activities.
#gdl2022 #memoryinpresence https://t.co/CQJuFsBgyv

urls.title: UNGA designates World day of prevention of child sexual abuse
urls.description: It encourages commitments for public awareness about child sexual abuse and to prevent and eliminate exploitation, abuse and violence.

urls.title: Scheduled: Is Feminist Foreign Policy fit for purpose?
urls.description: The World Today’s Space · Where live audio conversations happen

tweets.text:
Is #FeministForeignPolicy fit for purpose? @eirliani and @JesseBump say no - it’s time for a Fair Foreign Policy.

Join them, @TheWorldToday Editor @roxy_esco and @IPQuarterly's @HoffHenning  to explore what that means for foreign policy and for Germany.

https://t.co/7zFmZ7gydf

urls.title: Feminist foreign policy needs an upgrade
urls.description: ‘FFP2.0’ would have a less gendered focus, broader fairness and better alignment with domestic policy, say Eirliani Abdul Rahman and Jesse Bump.

tweets.text:
'Fair foreign policy resolves longstanding limitations in feminist foreign policy while extending its strengths in a more broadly inclusive, equity-centred framework.'

Read more from @eirliani & @JesseBump 👇

https://t.co/yuFwe16BPG

#ForeignPolicy

tweets.text:
Here's some background reading. The authors @eirliani  and @JesseBump will be in conversation with me and @HoffHenning tomorrow.

https://t.co/Uraso9aNaz

Wenn die EU und alle weiter so still ist, werden jetzt Todesurteile gegen Menschen, die für ihr Recht auf Freiheit und Selbstbestimmung demonstriert haben, vollstreckt. Wie lange wollen wir uns das anschauen? Tut bitte endlich was! https://t.co/FvQiULHFtI

"Hands off our girls" 👏👏 

@FirstLadyBio concludes her address to the @UN on a powerful note, urging action with the establishment of #Nov18WorldDay #UNGA77 #Live https://t.co/xF1qUxqzAy

“We adopted November 18 as a World Day to increase awareness about the actions all governments can take to prevent abuse and bring healing to survivors” - @DrJWortham 

The recognition of #Nov18WorldDay @UN will enable prevention, healing and justice for so many more 🌍❤ (2/2)

In a historic moment today, the @UN has passed the resolution to recognise #Nov18WorldDay for the Prevention of and Healing from Child Sexual Exploitation, Abuse and Violence. (1/2) 
#UNGA77 https://t.co/8uYCkd3qhO

We are so thankful to every member of our international community @Nov18worldday 

Your tireless efforts, and continuing support has made this milestone possible. #Nov18WorldDay 🕯 https://t.co/8XtILVonsa

Championed by the Global Collaborative with PCA America as a founding partner, the new World Day will mobilize civil society and governments to act to prevent child sexual abuse (CSA) and bring recognition to the challenges experienced by CSA survivors. (2/2)
PCA America is pleased to share that today the @UN declared Nov 18 World Day for Prevention of and Healing from Child Sexual Exploitation, Abuse and Violence. (1/2) https://t.co/JE4eguRvio

When I first spoke to @FirstLadyBio about our mission, she told me - I believe in what you are doing, and I’m going to help you. She stood by her word and here we are today. We are all so grateful for what she has done, she is our forever hero #Nov18WorldDay 🕯 https://t.co/0hg1WMEUZU

In pursuit of  @PresidentBio agenda for  the protection of our children #SierraLeone partnering with #Nigeria pioneered a groundbreaking #UNGA resolution to declare Nov 18th "World Day for the Prevention of and Healing from Child Sexual Exploitation, Abuse and Violence" THANK YOU https://t.co/ksqOM5XWoO

Today the @UN declared #Nov18WorldDay for the Prevention of & Healing from Child Sexual Exploitation, Abuse & Violence. 

This is an important moment to catalyse action with & for the 1 in 8 people around the world who have reported experiencing sexual abuse as a child. https://t.co/MdNqlCOSo1

"The louder we get, it reduces the number of victims that we have" - @FirstLadyBio 

With @DrJWortham, moments after the landmark vote @UN declaring #Nov18WorldDay for the Prevention of and Healing from Child Sexual Exploitation, Abuse and Violence. 🕯 #UNGA77 https://t.co/LYacaAhNL2

We kick off today the official opening of “Memory in Presence:
Memorial sites as places of empowering education” Lab 📍 Argentina.
We will work together with memory sites, exhibitions, museum and explore transnational approach to memory cultural. 

Stay tuned for more! https://t.co/m71ykQhyVY
History in the making ⚡ #Nov18WorldDay #UNGA77 @Nov18worldday https://t.co/EhFA72daRi
